song.title: Broken Heart
song.lyrics:
Don't mind me, just let me be My eyes so far away I don't need no sympathy The word gets overplayed
I'm alright, it's just tonight I can't play the part I'm alright, it's alright It's just a broken heart.
Don't have eyes for the world outside They're closed and turned within Trying to find a light inside It's there and growing dim
I'm alright, it's just tonight I can't play the part I'm alright, it's alright It's just one broken heart...
